column1: More good news: Pfizer will seek emergency authorization from the FDA for their coronavirus vaccine. We are another step closer to a vaccine! https://t.co/aFdynxYunN

We continue to receive good news about a potential COVID vaccine. I’m participating in a clinical trial because I believe once a vaccine is approved it will be both safe and effective. https://t.co/Jxg1oolrcZ
GOOD NEWS --> The House just passed my legislation to combat scams during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/cgxkWHkCsL
More great news about a COVID-19 vaccine today! https://t.co/7bimGA4oLX
I am confident that when a COVID-19 vaccine is approved by the FDA it will be both safe and effective. I’m participating in a vaccine clinical trial myself to prove it. https://t.co/pS5agIYsjv
Even during difficult times due to COVID-19 Georgia has been named the #1 State for Business again this year! https://t.co/SvjFILetxY

Great news from Pfizer today on a COVID-19 vaccine. Thanks to @realDonaldTrump and Operation Warp Speed if the FDA approves the Pfizer vaccine we will have 100 million doses ready for distribution!  https://t.co/bJQ2u2G3NP

It was great to be in Jesup yesterday to participate in a roundtable with the Wayne County Recovery Coalition. We had an important conversation on combating the opioid epidemic. As we battle COVID-19 we must also continue to fight other health issues in our communities. https://t.co/je54kZiXei
I have signed up for a COVID-19 vaccine trial because I am confident that any vaccine will be both SAFE and EFFECTIVE. Here is a quick update about my first day in the trial. https://t.co/n5JOVfRt3M

Glad to have @GovKemp and officials from @HHSGov in Savannah today to meet with health care professionals and business leaders in our community as we continue to address the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/DG1IXJdsUh

We had a great visit to Cal-Maine Eggs in Hoboken yesterday. Cal-Maine donated more than 1 million eggs to those in need through Second Harvest Food Bank during the COVID-19 pandemic. Neighbors helping neighbors in the First District! https://t.co/2F4MKkbjhT

Dems put a partisan wishlist on the floor tonight instead of agreeing to a compromise on COVID relief. When Georgians ask me what is wrong with Congress and Washington...this is it. As Americans continue to struggle this vote and the Speaker's refusal to compromise is shameful.

PASSED: This week the House unanimously approved legislation I introduced to establish and expand state strategic stockpiles to prepare for future events like the COVID-19 pandemic.  Learn more --> https://t.co/IWeXTS1YKl
Operation Warp Speed is working to develop a SAFE and EFFECTIVE vaccine for COVID-19 as soon as possible. Learn more from the #GOPDoctorsCaucus. https://t.co/palYCwVRnE

Our nation’s top scientists medical professionals and manufacturers are working around the clock through Operation Warp Speed to develop vaccines and treatments for COVID-19. I am confident that we can deliver a vaccine quickly that is both safe and effective. https://t.co/VMeScyJ7fY
Proud of @GeorgiaStateU for continuing to innovate and deliver for its students through #COVID19 https://t.co/bRnImOZx8W

We visited Memorial today for an update on their COVID-19 response. I continue to be extremely impressed by the preparedness and professionalism that all of our health care providers have displayed during the pandemic. THANK YOU! https://t.co/bPlwaZdv3I

The Paycheck Protection Program is still helping small businesses in the First District. When employees at Storehouse Salvage in Pembroke were impacted by COVID-19 the PPP helped to make sure the business could stay running while keeping employees safe and healthy. https://t.co/3cjnHsZRfL
Rural broadband is more important than ever during the COVID-19 pandemic. I'm proud to support bipartisan solutions to make sure all Americans are connected. https://t.co/A3UiOfWiq6
More CARES Act funding is heading to the First District to help small businesses and entrepreneurs that have been adversely impacted by the coronavirus pandemic. Read more --> https://t.co/lpkxBPDu4Z

Good news - Savannah will receive more than $2 million from @HUDgov to support homeless families and individuals who have been impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic. The funding is available through the CARES Act. @WTOC11 https://t.co/DOO9BE9BZH

I'll be hosting a telephone town hall tonight at approx. 6:35 pm. We will be joined by an official from SBA to provide updates and answer questions as small businesses work to recover from COVID-19.  If you live in GA-01 sign up to join here: https://t.co/MtT1VAenCc
If you've recovered from COVID-19 your immune system has antibodies that may help others! To learn more visit https://t.co/VxqLp4gcd8.

.@realDonaldTrump is right about WHO – we cannot allow taxpayer dollars to continue to finance an organization that is so clearly not serving our interests. I introduced legislation to investigate WHO's COVID-19 response bc we must hold them accountable.  https://t.co/gC1V52fK2J

The WHO covered-up for China and their suppression of the truth. I introduced legislation to investigate the WHO's COVID-19 response because the American people deserve answers and Congress must hold the WHO accountable. https://t.co/d4ZUi2f1E7
I want to answer your questions about COVID-19. Tweet your questions with the hashtag #AskBuddy and we will answer as many as possible.
I'll be joining @AARPGA for a COVID-19 Teletown Hall on Tuesday April 21 starting at 10 a.m. ET. To join the live call please dial the toll-free number at 1-833-380-0513. https://t.co/vzmBzSoDw6

.@SecretarySonny and the @USDA have created the Meals for Kids Site Finder. This is an online tool to help families find meal sites in their area for children out of the classroom due to the coronavirus. Visit https://t.co/6f2E1vc5Ny then enter your zip code. https://t.co/mM80FPkuiP
Important information on #COVID19 testing from @GovKemp. https://t.co/X1m23xzoox

The WHO failed at responding to the pandemic and covered for China’s lies as they suppressed information about COVID-19. The world has now been turned upside down & @realDonaldTrump made the right call to hold taxpayer funding until they are in a position to get their job done.
I introduced legislation this week to help prevent scams during the COVID-19 pandemic. The more Americans know about the scams the easier it will be to protect themselves. https://t.co/alBqAaqW32

I'll be joining @NCODAorg tonight at 8:00 pm for a discussion on the coronavirus. Register for the webinar here: https://t.co/aT4MbNRnTw. After registering you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar. https://t.co/uZENIhE6yN

I introduced legislation to help prevent scams during the COVID-19 pandemic. The more Americans know about the scams the easier it will be to protect themselves. Read more here: https://t.co/xXOv9cZnGA

As we celebrate Palm Sunday today and the beginning of Holy Week I take heart in the palm as a symbol of victory. We will triumph over the coronavirus just as Jesus triumphed over death. https://t.co/kj5mCZwlRU

The coronavirus is a wake-up call. We cannot continue to be dependent on China and India for life-saving medications and medical supplies.  I wrote an op-ed on @FoxNews about the need for pharmaceutical independence and how we're working to achieve it:   https://t.co/hJYam8MOG2

Will there be rent or mortgage relief?  HUD is suspending foreclosures and evictions amid the coronavirus. Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have been ordered to suspend foreclosures and evictions.  For information regarding a loan or mortgage contact your lender directly.
TUNE IN: I'll be joining @WTOC11 at 7:30 pm tonight for a virtual town hall about the coronavirus. Watch here: https://t.co/hUgntNcrhr

Our doctors nurses pharmacists and other health care providers are on the front lines of the coronavirus pandemic. Join me in thanking all of our health care heroes. #nationaldoctorsday https://t.co/0fu0vZtWVK

We are in Brunswick this morning helping distribute lunches to students who are out of the classroom due to the coronavirus. Check your county board of education or your school website for more information on lunch pick-up in your area. https://t.co/vxp5v83KB8

I'll be hosting a telephone town hall tomorrow night with an official from the Georgia Department of Public Health to provide updates and answer questions about the #coronavirus at approximately 5:40 pm.  If you live in #GA01 sign up to join here: https://t.co/jIqM1Ic7ve

I visited members of our agricultural community today to see firsthand how the coronavirus is impacting Georgia's top industry. Thank you to our farmers and growers who are always committed to providing America with a safe abundant food supply. #InItTogether https://t.co/mF74to8DAH

I joined @FoxFriendsFirst this morning to discuss how Democrats are politicizing the #coronavirus and using it to push their far-left agenda that has nothing to do with the health crisis we are facing.   Now is not the time for partisanship now is the time for patriotism. https://t.co/HzuLxG9t8i

We’re in Rincon this morning helping distribute lunches to students who are out of the classroom due to the coronavirus. Check your county board of education or your individual school’s website for more information in your area. #inittogether https://t.co/qhBH4NBnoI
TUNE IN: I'm joining @VelshiMSNBC at approximately 8:50 am to discuss the #coronavirus.

The challenges created by the #coronavirus pandemic are unprecedented for teachers parents and schools. As we navigate these uncharted times together find some helpful resources here: https://t.co/8hEl08DuTh
I wrote an op-ed on @FoxNews with other medical professionals in Congress about our nation defeating the coronavirus together. Read here:  https://t.co/hS5x5Cc67h

The White House Coronavirus Task Force @realDonaldTrump  and @CDCgov have released new guidelines to help slow the spread of the #coronavirus. We can all do our part to help slow the spread! https://t.co/H35qrr8pPC

The coronavirus is an important wake-up call about the critical need for America’s pharmaceutical independence. We can’t continue to be dependent on foreign markets like China and India for critical medications. https://t.co/zuAM2sItf8
The State of Georgia has a new COVID-19 hotline. Georgians can call 1-844-442-2681 with questions or concerns about the coronavirus.
Join me in praying for our nation and those impacted by the #coronavirus. https://t.co/hrm1v62kRi
TUNE IN: I’m joining @foxandfriends at approximately 9:15 am to discuss the latest on the #coronavirus.
TUNE IN: Joining @foxnewsnight soon to talk the latest on the #coronavirus.

.@realDonaldTrump made the right decision to declare a national emergency today. The Administration is taking decisive and necessary action to address the #coronavirus. This will free up billions of dollars for state and local response efforts on the ground.
I’m hosting a telephone town hall tonight to discuss the #coronavirus at approximately 5:45 pm. If you live in #GA01 sign up here: https://t.co/rNi0VJwWtD https://t.co/VXkKgvRsdZ

I'll be hosting a telephone town hall tonight with an official from the Georgia Department of Public Health to provide updates and answer questions about the #coronavirus at approximately 5:45 pm. If you live in #GA01 sign up to join the call here: https://t.co/rNi0VJwWtD
Important information for you and your family about the #coronavirus https://t.co/Hsnm0IF3oS

We should have voted on a funding bill last week but Democrats needed more time to politicize this public health emergency.   This is not the time for political games. We must come together and pass a clean funding bill to address the #coronavirus ASAP. https://t.co/1fsS0iD6bb

In my years of practicing as a pharmacist I have seen nothing short of miracles due to research and development. I am glad to see the public and private sectors on the same page working to address the #coronavirus with @realDonaldTrump and @VP. https://t.co/ekPGA4pUXe

The greatest scientists are right here in America. I am confident that @realDonaldTrump @VP the Administration and America’s innovators are doing everything they can to prepare and respond to the #coronavirus. https://t.co/uAkitlxjY8
TUNE IN! I’ll be joining @MorningsMaria soon to talk #coronavirus. https://t.co/8aMx24yXbN

Glad to see @realDonaldTrump appoint @VP to lead the task force to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. The greatest smartest scientists in the world are right here in the United States and we must work together to address the situation.
.@SecAzar is testifying before us now in @HouseCommerce on the @HHSGov budget and #COVID19. Tune in: https://t.co/wrZeQzfA97
We continue to monitor #COVID19 very carefully. Looking forward to having @SecAzar before @HouseCommerce tomorrow to discuss continued preparation and potential response. https://t.co/0rbEE8lfo0

Met with @CDCgov yesterday about the coronavirus. The Director informed us that at this time the immediate risk to the American people is low. While the risk is low it is a rapidly changing situation and CDC recommends taking precautions outlined here - https://t.co/ThTF0w605X
